price: 4. Longola sé epai ya bapagano baye bokamataki na bango elaka mpe sima balongoli тропа bino eloko te, mpe basalisaki banguna te тропа kobundisa bino mpe kosala bino mabe te, bokokisela bango elaka na bango kino tango oyo boyokanaki na bango ekoka. Pamba te ya sôló, Allah alingaka baye babangaka.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَنقُصُوكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَمۡ يُظَٰهِرُواْ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَحَدٗا فَأَتِمُّوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِمۡ عَهۡدَهُمۡ إِلَىٰ مُدَّتِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna ʿāhadttum mina al-mush'rikīna thumma lam yanquṣūkum shayan walam yuẓāhirū ʿalaykum aḥadan fa-atimmū ilayhim ʿahdahum ilā muddatihim inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
